description: AI Agent Framework para Laravel 12 + React 19 + Livewire 3

skills.name: saas
skills.description: Main entry point for SaaS development - quick reference for all components. Triggers on general saas development questions.

skills.name: saas-app
skills.description: Guidelines for Laravel backend development in the app/ directory, emphasizing Eloquent ORM, Sanctum authentication, and PHP 8.3 conventions. Triggers on working on Laravel backend code.

skills.name: saas-resources
skills.description: Convenciones, patrones y dependencias para el frontend de SaaS React usando React 19, Inertia.js, shadcn/ui, Tailwind 4 y su integración con backend Laravel. Triggers on UI SaaS questions, frontend-backend integration.
skills.auto_invoke: Preguntas sobre UI SaaS, integración frontend-backend, patrones de permisos.

skills.name: saas-module
skills.description: Module creator for saas, generating CRUD interfaces following the users structure. Triggers on creating new modules.

skills.name: saas-backend-module
skills.description: Backend module creator for saas, generating controllers, requests, and models following Laravel conventions. Triggers on creating new backend modules.

skills.name: saas-component-refactor
skills.description: Refactors existing Laravel controllers to use Actions and API Resources for better architecture, and creates new CRUD components following SaaS patterns. Triggers on refactoring controllers or creating CRUD modules.
skills.auto_invoke: Refactoring controllers or creating CRUD modules

skills.name: saas-pr
skills.description: Creates Pull Requests for saas following the project template and conventions. Triggers on creating or reviewing Pull Requests.

skills.name: saas-changelog
skills.description: Manages changelog entries for saas components following keepachangelog.com format. Triggers on adding changelog entries or updating CHANGELOG.md.
skills.auto_invoke: Adding changelog entries or updating CHANGELOG.md

skills.name: document-signatures
skills.description: Sistema de firma de documentos PDF con campos configurables para elaborador y responsable. Incluye traits ReportTrait, WithDocumentSignature, y vistas de aprobación.
skills.auto_invoke: Working with PDF signatures, report generation

skills.name: laravel
skills.description: Guidelines and workflow for working on Laravel 11 or Laravel 12 applications with Docker Compose/Sail, Inertia, Livewire, Tailwind v4, and Laravel Boost tools. Triggers on working on Laravel backend code.

skills.name: laravel-api
skills.description: Build production-grade Laravel REST APIs using opinionated architecture patterns. Triggers on 'build a Laravel API', 'create Laravel endpoints', 'add API authentication', 'review Laravel API code'.
skills.auto_invoke: Building, scaffolding, or reviewing Laravel APIs

skills.name: livewire-development
skills.description: Develops reactive Livewire 3 components. Triggers on creating, updating, or modifying Livewire components; working with wire: directives; adding real-time updates.
skills.auto_invoke: Creating or modifying Livewire components, wire: directives

skills.name: shadcn
skills.description: Manages shadcn/ui components installation, customization, and usage in SaaS React. Triggers on adding shadcn components.

skills.name: typescript
skills.description: TypeScript strict patterns and best practices for .ts/.tsx files. Triggers on writing TypeScript types/interfaces.

skills.name: tailwind-4
skills.description: Tailwind CSS 4 patterns and best practices for styling with className, variants, and cn(). Triggers on working with Tailwind classes.

skills.name: react-19
skills.description: React 19 patterns with React Compiler for components and hooks in .tsx files. Triggers on writing React components.

skills.name: skill-creator
skills.description: Creates new AI agent skills following the Agent Skills spec. Triggers on creating new skills.
